column1: im the one with the horrible attitude and i'll admit that so now he got an attitude im suppose to be getting a phone call later but... rt ever wonder where you'd be if that one thing didn't happen ..? i didnt even talk to nobody at work im staying quiet to not curse nobody out rt trust at an all time low these days😩. no one keep it 100 these days. rt i'll struggle before i ask... they play games every week with this register i signed out and walked off rt making it look easy is the hard part rain is so soothing my chest hurts so bad 😔 not fighting no more... i try so hard cause i see potential i got a lot of anger built up i just say fuck it and leave before its an argument rt i would really love to take random road trips. rt never break the heart of the one who loves you. hair done, about to cook, wash clothes and watch focus somebody come blow dry and flat iron my hair 😩😩 and he tried to get me a bottle my dad paying my car note next month and told me to go buy me something nice with my check rt so yeah men be like 'what if i get bored with u' when they *should* be asking 'what if u get tired of my shiftless aint… was trying to take him breakfast but thats dead im not in the mood for the bs today or nobody attitude cause i dont feel good at all i just wanna know its all gone be worth it but right now i don't feel that way if thats the case what we keep doing this for... that dream i had last night my lil bro stay getting some shoes i wasn't trying to sleep that long 😷😷😷 i made it home just in time aint said nothing since i been here rt i want some individual braids so bad. 😩 im falling in one of my moods im foolish i've never smoked alone smh i want my babies i try so hard and keep failing i just be thinking to myself why me guess i'll go have lunch alone 😔 my job takes me off the schedule then wants me to work and at 6am maybe i shouldn't have came to campus i done told them about bothering me on my damn off day she just asked me why they took me off the schedule for fridays. go ask your dumb ass gm and let me know we use to say we ride til the day we die rule #1: never trust anybody and my baby crawling so i don't have to just hold her spoiled butt no more 😩🙌 i always tell the kids they can't come back but i start missing them so much and break down and get them   tried to charge me $110 to look at why my trunk keep having water in it. 110 to just fucking look thats it rt don't be mad when i pull a 'you' on you 👐 i called these people to do my hair and they hung up oh well rt when you finally get something good, enjoy it. don't go looking for something better.. im just gone keep my mouth closed about this no problem baby get dressed and handle business stfu i don't be having nobody to talk too. guess thats what happens when you try to make someone happy and change 😔 it be like i get attitude all the time you got it lil daddy 👌 i definitely don't like the way he just said that shit but 👌👌 rt your opinion of me never mattered. rt the best way to avoid disappointment is to not expect anything from anyone. he never tells me anything he gotta be by far the most difficult person to actually communicate with 😟😟 rt - all i want is to be appreciated. rt even when we say we're through, we still just might come back to you. #pisces #suckerforlove i just be like 😫🙊👌 rt how to escape life: music. say how you feel... nope no problem lol wateva 😂😂😭😭 same think my bf said rt trying to get a house just so me and my girl can fuck in every room before kids come in the picture. rt once you get attached to someone 😩👫💍😻 , its soooo hard to break away from them 💯 rt niggas do everything that they don't won't they girl doing✔ i've had a long day and i just want a blunt but he wanna play games with me this nigga phone never on!! this boy wanted to take me on a date but... play with me if you want and i'll hurt your mf feelings!!! its always something and they wonder why my attitude is horrible bet... think im gone get my hair done in the morning cause lord knows my head looks a hot ass mess right now at&t about to be giving me another phone if mine keep going out like this rt he said he'd never hurt me spoiler alert: he did! 😐 my whole right side is in pain baby got his motor in... rt morning sex would be clutch😌 these kids walking the opposite way of school i need to take my car for this recall i hate and grandma there now me and bae gotta go to the gun range and andretti's 😌 my lil nephew gone be 2 tomorrow and he told me he wants a gift 😳 work at 6am lord i be tired dad just came in clutch rt (official video) #prosper rt do anything to make this shit work 💪 rt this tweet is so accurate lmao that lady be mad my ma and god ma go out and leave her she too damn old to have had that shit on fr yet again but its cool i be in my own world rt i'm sensitive, and i need a specific kind of care i keep my comments to myself im hungry af my sister told me to not neglect my health and she was doing just wanna be fed, given head, & fucked to bed 👌😩. i want my booty rubbed on now 😔 rt ion think nobody can make you more mad than yo mama & bf/gf. that dream i had earlier 😩😊 rt yall add bitches then lasagna i been over the stove for the last 2 hours cooking. my feet are killing me rt i don't have a lot of girl friends because y'all don't know how to be friends. rt *new* (official video) prosper -
